title: New client takes up to 20 secs to enter new champ select
body:
this started happen after the latest patch.

Any solutions?

Anyone else having this problem?

{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Are you getting a black screen instead?  This is something we're looking to get more info on.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with some logs that can be obtained through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  In the meantime, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) might serve as a workaround.  We'd like to take a closer look!
